table.name: adapter
table.comment:
Information about a physical adapter enumerated via DXGI.
Also contains its associated description queried from IDXGIAdapter1::GetDesc1.
This data is collected to drive optimization decisions, aid in debugging,
and to assist in determining minimum and average system requirements.

column.name: luid
column.comment: The locally unique ID of the adapter, from DXGI_ADAPTER_DESC1::AdapterLuid.

column.name: description
column.comment: The description string of this adapter, from DXGI_ADAPTER_DESC1::Description

column.name: flags
column.comment: Flags associated with this adapter, from DXGI_ADAPTER_DESC1::Flags

column.name: video_memory
column.comment:
Size of dedicated video memory, in bytes, not accessable
on the CPU. From DXGI_ADAPTER_DESC1::DedicatedVideoMemory.

column.name: system_memory
column.comment:
Size of system memory, in bytes, allocated to the device.
From DXGI_ADAPTER_DESC1::DedicatedSystemMemory.

column.name: shared_memory
column.comment:
Maximum size, in bytes, of shared memory region that is accessible
on both host and device. From DXGI_ADAPTER_DESC1::SharedSystemMemory.

column.name: vendor_id
column.comment:
PCI or APIC ID associated with this devices hardware vendor.
From DXGI_ADAPTER_DESC1::VendorId.

column.name: device_id
column.comment:
PCI or APIC ID associated with this devices hardware.
From DXGI_ADAPTER_DESC1::DeviceId.

column.name: subsystem_id
column.comment:
PCI or APIC ID associated with this devices subsystem.
From DXGI_ADAPTER_DESC1::SubSysId.

column.name: revision
column.comment:
The PCI or APIC revision number of the device.
From DXGI_ADAPTER_DESC1::Revision.

table.name: output
table.comment:
A physical output device connected to an adapter.
Enumerated from IDXGIAdapter::EnumOutputs and IDXGIOutput::GetDesc.

column.name: name
column.comment: The name of the connected display, from DXGI_OUTPUT_DESC::DeviceName.

column.name: left
column.comment:
The left edge of the output on the virtual canvas,
from DXGI_OUTPUT_DESC::DesktopCoordinates.

column.name: top
column.comment:
The top edge of the output on the virtual canvas,
from DXGI_OUTPUT_DESC::DesktopCoordinates.

column.name: right
column.comment:
The right edge of the output on the virtual canvas,
from DXGI_OUTPUT_DESC::DesktopCoordinates.

column.name: bottom
column.comment:
The bottom edge of the output on the virtual canvas,
from DXGI_OUTPUT_DESC::DesktopCoordinates.

column.name: attached_to_desktop
column.comment: Is this output attached to a desktop, from DXGI_OUTPUT_DESC::AttachedToDesktop.

column.name: rotation
column.comment: The reported rotation of this display, from DXGI_OUTPUT_DESC::Rotation.

table.name: mode
table.comment:
A display mode available on an output in a given format.
Retrieved from IDXGIOutput::GetDisplayModeList with DXGI_ENUM_MODES_INTERLACED.
